docs.lead_paragraph: Video 1 shows a 58-year-old man with a 10-year history of idiopathic Parkinson's disease and an incapacitating freezing of gait. Video 2 shows his continued ability to ride a bicycle.  (Credit: The New England Journal of Medicine)

headline.sub: Patient Unable to Walk but Rides Bike

docs.snippet: Video 1 shows a 58-year-old man with a 10-year history of idiopathic Parkinson's disease and an incapacitating freezing of gait. Video 2 shows his continued ability to ride a bicycle.  (Credit: The New England Journal of Medicine)
